rules_text:
Trample
When this creature enter, it deal X damage to target player, where X is the number of creatures you control with toughness greater than your power, and you gain X life. [i](How does this even work?)[/i]
notes:
ARTed

Rank_1 Rank_3

Reason: Either we delete it because "your power" doesn't make any sense or we change the typo to "...where X is the number of creatures you control with toughness greater than their power, and you gain X life."
